comments.text:
Created attachment 516739
Close Button Comparison

Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110303 Firefox/4.0b13pre ID:20110303030406 (Royal Theme).

See the attached Screenshot (with hovered State) for Comparison after Landing of Bug 570279.
Toggling Tabs on Top <-> Bottom make no Difference.

As you can see, the Button shifted 2px to the right.

I'd suggest putting it back those 2px.

Moreover the Tab Strip Height could be +/-1px, so that the Button has equal vertical Spacing to the Strip's Borders (now uneven 5/4px).

Another Idea would be to resize the whole Button Shape and make it bigger (15/16px?).
